coded_answer.p: I'm writing to you representingon behalf of all the englishEnglish class in order to let you know how excitingexcited we are about the trip to London and to give you some ideas of other things we are interrestinginterestinginterested onin doing in London while we're there.

First of all, we'd like to thank you for the programme you all readyalready arrangehave already arranged it's. It's wonderful, because it covers most of our interrestsinterests. But also we would like to visit The London Fashion and Leisure showShow that will be held at the Central kExhibitionExhibition hallHall on Tuesday March 14 from 10:00 - 19:00. So we suggest to putputtingdoing itthings this way on Tuesday 14,: in the morning go to the Science Museum and, instead of shopping, we could attend the London Fashion showShow, because there will be the latest fashionfashions, leisure wear, and sports wearsportswear, make upmake-up, and hair styles, and as you know us, we love all those topics, and it's a great opportunity while we are in London.
Thank you for your time,. and We're looking forward to hearing from youryou opionsoon.
IT WAS DANGEROUS, BUT I KNEW I HAD TO DO IT ...BECAUSE

Since always I'd gotten the idea ofI had always wanted travelto travel abroad and experieceexperience othersother people's lifelives and cultures, so I decided to go to Paris as soon as I finished university.

I arrived in Paris foron New YearsYear's Eve 2000 without a place to stay, not speaking any French, alone and with a littlesmall amount of money. But eventhougheven thoughin spite of all of these desadventagesdisadvantages above, I was follingfollowingpursuing my dreams and objectives and inspitein spite of everything I was going to do it.

So suddenly, a week later I found memyself a job as an au pair, taking care of two little girls that only spoke frenchFrench at that momenttime. It took me three months to overcameovercomelearn the languageslanguage and afterby this time the whole famillyfamily falledfellhad fallen in love with me, so that when they decided to move to London, they invited me and now we all live here and I feel like part of the famillyfamily, eventhougheven though Itit was very hard at the begginingbeginning.
